content:
{"name": "Feast of Justice - Northeast Service Hub", "alternate_name": "", "description": "How to Register and Receive an FOJ ID Card in 3 steps!

**FIRST** complete the online application. Please include your email in your application if possible. You will receive confirmation AND an option to make a registration appointment VIA EMAIL.
The online application will make the process faster.

**NEXT** make an appointment to complete your registration OR "walk-up" during our available registration times. To schedule an appointment, email [registration@feastofjustice.org](mailto://registration@feastofjustice.org) or leave us a message 215-268-3510 ext. 4. (When calling, leave one voicemail message with your name. We will respond to your call.)

**FINALLY** arrive for your registration appointment and receive your FOJ ID card. To expedite your registration, you can bring
* Photo ID,
* proof of address, and
* documentation for family members to your appointment.
* These documents **ARE NOT REQUIRED**. You will also receive food when you complete the registration process.

Feast of Justice serves 11 zip codes; 19111, 19114, 19115, 19116, 19120, 19124, 19135, 19136, 19149, 19152, and 19154.", "email": "", "url": "www.feastofjustice.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6434 Castor Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Northeast Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19149", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.04080829999999, "longitude": -75.0767602}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 268-3510", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
